scripts.docker:dev: rm -rf nginx && umi build && mkdir -p nginx/conf && mkdir -p nginx/logs && mkdir -p nginx/www/typhoon && cp -r dist/ nginx/www/typhoon/ && cp nginx.conf nginx/conf/default.conf && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:build: rm -rf nginx && umi build && mkdir -p nginx/conf && mkdir -p nginx/logs && mkdir -p nginx/www/typhoon && cp -r dist/ nginx/www/typhoon/ && cp nginx.conf nginx/conf/default.conf && docker build -t registry.njuics.cn/typhoon-frontend/typhoon-frontend:latest ./
scripts.update: rm -rf nginx && umi build && mkdir -p nginx/conf && mkdir -p nginx/logs && mkdir -p nginx/www/typhoon && cp -r dist/ nginx/www/typhoon/ && cp nginx.conf nginx/conf/default.conf
